    • Method Detail

      • getChessSquareState

        public ChessSquareState getChessSquareState(Position position)
        Gets the state of given position on board
        Parameters:
        position - on board of the square (in bounds: row: 0-7 column: 0-7)
        Returns:
        instance of ChessSquareState that will contain following information: - if square is occupied - piece that the square is occupied by

      • ifEmpty

        public boolean ifEmpty(Position position)
        Checks if position is empty
        Parameters:
        position - on board of the square (in bounds: row: 0-7 column: 0-7)
        Returns:
        true if chess square in given position is empty

      • ifOccupiedByOpponent

        public boolean ifOccupiedByOpponent(Position position,
                                    Color color)
        Checks if position is occupied by an opponent
        Parameters:
        position - on board of the square (in bounds: row: 0-7 column: 0-7)
        color - of the piece (the opponent should have contrary)
        Returns:
        true if chess square is occupied by an opponent

      • getLegalMoves

        public java.util.List<Move> getLegalMoves(Color color)
        Gets from every piece of given color set list of PRE SAVED moves and combines them moves should be first generated by update game method
        Parameters:
        color - of the set that moves should be get for
        Returns:
        list of all legal moves for given set color

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(Move move)
        Makes a move on board Used move should be firstly validated by validatePlayersMove and only instance of Move returned by that method should be used
        Parameters:
        move - pre validated move

      • getListOfChanges

        public static java.util.List<Change> getListOfChanges(Move move)
        Returns the list of changes that given move would do but doesn't make changes on the board Used move should be firstly validated by validatePlayersMove and only instance of Move returned by that method should be used
        Parameters:
        move - pre validated move

      • updateGame

        public GameState updateGame(Color turn)
        Updates game state. Generates all legal moves for the set that will move next. Returns the state of the game.
        Parameters:
        turn - color of the set that will move next
        Returns:
        game state (CHECKMATE, STALEMATE, GAME_RUNNING) if CHECKMATE then the winner is the player that made a move before update

      • validatePlayersMove

        public Move validatePlayersMove(Position loc,
                                Position dest,
                                Color color)
        Validates players move.
        Parameters:
        color - players color
        loc - position of the piece that player wants to move
        dest - destination of the piece that player wants to move if the move is a castle then location should be kings position and destination rooks position
        Returns:
        instance of class move, that can be used later to give as parameter to makeMove method to actually make move on board

      • validateIfAfterMoveKingNotInCapture

        public boolean validateIfAfterMoveKingNotInCapture(Move move)
        Validates given move in the following way: Makes copy of the board. Makes on that copy given move. Checks if the king in color of the making move piece is not under capture.
        Parameters:
        move - move to be validated
        Returns:
        true if after move king is NOT under capture, means that given move is valid

      • copy

        public Board copy()
        Makes and returns a copy of the board. Uses copies of sets and pieces.
        Returns:
        copied board

      • getBoard

        public Piece[][] getBoard()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
